LanguageData.ST_Settings_AutoSwapBatteries_Tooltip: When enabled, pawns will automatically swap to a charged battery when their current battery drops below the threshold.
LanguageData.ST_Settings_AutoSwapThreshold_Tooltip: Battery charge percentage at which pawns will automatically swap to a fresh battery.
LanguageData.ST_Gizmo_EjectBattery_Desc: Remove the battery from this tool and place it in inventory or drop it nearby.
LanguageData.ST_Gizmo_InsertBattery_Desc: Insert a battery into this tool from inventory or nearby storage.
